entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
